mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO qh_video (user_id, uuid, video_cover, video_desc, channel_id, video_title, video_duration, video_url, like_times, play_times, comment_times, share_times, store_times, upload_time)
VALUES (#{userId}, #{uuid}, #{cover}, #{desc}, #{channel}, #{title}, #{duration}, #{url}, #{likeTimes}, #{playTimes}, #{commentTimes}, #{shareTimes}, #{storeTimes}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, uuid, video_cover, video_desc, video_title, video_duration, video_url, like_times, play_times, comment_times, share_times, store_times, upload_time FROM qh_video v JOIN qh_user_like_video qulv ON v.video_id=qulv.video_id AND qulv.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY qulv.like_time limit #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE qh_video SET play_times = play_times + 1 WHERE video_id=#{videoId}
UPDATE qh_video SET like_times = like_times + 1 WHERE video_id=#{videoId}
UPDATE qh_video SET like_times = like_times - 1 WHERE video_id=#{videoId}
UPDATE qh_video SET comment_times = comment_times + 1 WHERE video_id=#{videoId}
